scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demoNative; tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.ios.watch.sim: npm run preparedemo; cd demoNative; tns livesync ios --emulator --watch
scripts.demo.ios.watch: npm run preparedemo; cd demoNative; tns livesync ios --watch
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demoNative; tns emulate android
scripts.demo.android.watch: npm run preparedemo; cd demoNative; tns livesync android --emulator --watch
scripts.run.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demoNative; tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd demoNative; tns plugin remove nativescript-plugin-appsflyer; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.setup: cd demoNative; npm install; cd ..; npm run build; cd demoNative; tns plugin add ..; cd ..
